subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Juan José Cobo closed in on the Vuelta a España title after holding onto the overall lead in the 20th stage won by Daniele Bennati.
snippet: Juan José Cobo closed in on the Vuelta a España title after holding onto the overall lead in the 20th stage won by Daniele Bennati.
